title: Heatwave continues across UK ahead of Monday temperature dip
description: Sunday will see possible highs of 31C before a slight dip that will bring a cooler change next week, the Met Office says.
content:
The heat has also affected sporting events, with Wimbledon fans braving close to the hottest women's finals day at the tennis championship.
Temperatures hit 31C in Wimbledon, south-west London, as Iga Swiatek beat Amanda Anisimova in the women's sing... [1338 chars]

title: Health secretary and BMA to meet next week
description: The meeting with Wes Streeting will take place next week, the BBC understands.
content:
Health secretary and BMA to meet in bid to avoid strikes
Resident doctors took part in 11 separate strikes during 2023 and 2024
The government has insisted it cannot improve its offer of a 5.4% increase for this year.

title: NHS doctors' strike: Health secretary and BMA to meet next week
description: The meeting with Wes Streeting will take place next week, the BBC understands.
content:
Resident doctors were awarded a 5.4% pay rise for this financial year - which will go into pay packets from August - following a 22% increase over the previous two years.
